lines.text: [after crashing the "train", i.e. Sylvester, into a brick wall]
You know, I lose more putty tats that way!

[as Sylvester is bouncing up to the birdhouse on a trampoline]
Bad ol' putty tat!
You make my widdle heart qwiver!
[Sylvester wears a helmet this time. As he rockets down, he sticks his tongue out at Tweety]

[the next time he comes up, Tweety puts a stick of dynamite into the helmet, which explodes offscreen]
Bad ol' putty tat!

[in Sylvester's ear]
Goody-goody for me, I is runnin' a choo-choo twain!
[pulls a cord, and a whistle blows]
That bad ol' putty tat never gonna find me in here.
